overview: The perfume industry is as tough as any other business. The company of a financially stricken perfume producer is about to be sold. During the sales talks various employees of the interested buyer parties strike up some personal and highly intimate relationships. Rough sex, messy facials and group sex are the result. But just as the deal is made, the ailing company releases a new aphrodisiac that promises to wipe everybody off their feet...
title: Elegance X
